#L7##bTo the last page of the diary#k#l

I have finally arrived the world of MapleStory. Through meeting new people, which included chatting and even receiving some help from them, I was able to reach a town called Amherst.\r\nJudging by the weak monsters showing up outside town, it doesn't seem like it's as dangerous as the place was made out to be...
The great weather seemed to be the norm here these days. \n\nI went around town for the past few days and this place is very peaceful.

I ran into Manji, and I was immediately taken aback by his cocky attitude, as if I shouldn't even be talking to him. Did a famous warrior get hit or something, just like John said? Anyway, I decided to roam around Perion.\nI met Ayan, a little girl. She's pale white, and yet she's dressed up as a native Indian, as if she's the chief's daughter. She may grow up to be quite a hottie...haha.
August 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Snowing in El Nath, even in the summer!
I'm still not used to this. Everytime I feel warm and fuzzy in Orbis with a warm breeze hitting me, I'll feel the icy coldness that penetrates my body once I get to El Nath.

A very disdainful old lady tried to see my horoscope by grabbing my hand and dragging me to her house, that I ran away to El Nath, eventhough I was ill-prepared for the coldness that surely greeted us. Thanks to that escape, I caught a very nasty fever, and I am currently recuperating at Jade's house.

I finally heard about a monster named Balrog. It looks like my first order of business is to kill it. Now, to get to Balrog ... go past the Ant Tunnel ... someone told me this place has a humongous door... oh well, I don't care, wouldn't I get there just by going deep into the Ant Tunnel?\nI better go to Manji first and get myself healed...

Table of Content
#L1##b1. What's a Beginner?#k#l
#L3##b2. Basic Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What are Items?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l
#L14##b5. What's a Job Advancement?#k#l
#L15##b6. 1st Job Advancement : How?#k#l

A beginner may not strike fear into anyone, but the potential is limitless. The abilities may not be there just yet, so the beginners spend the majority of the time at Maple Island training for the big time.
Once the training in Maple Island is complete, move to Victoria Island for a whole new set of competition, bigger world to play around with and job advancement.
Even the very best at one went through growing pains of being a beginner. Please train diligently to become a significant player yourself!

#eLeft, Right Arrow#n : Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n : Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE#n:  Opening equipment window
#eI#n: Opening item window
#eS#n: Opening ability window
#eK#n: Opening skill window
#bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, allot one of the HotKey's with a 'use' item or a skill to have easy access to the item or the skill.
Enter these commands in the chat window to use these functions

#e/all#n : Chat in regular method.
#e/buddy#n : Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n : Talk to your party members.
#e/guild#n : Talk to your guild members.
#e/whisper [character name]#n : whisper to a particular user.
#e/find [character name]#n : Checks the availability of the character / notifies the current place the character is in.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Request for a trade.

#e/partyinfo#n : Check out the information on the party members currently signed up in the party.
#e/makeparty#n : Create a new party.
#e/leaveparty#n : Leave the current party.
#e/partyexpell#n : Forcefully expells a party member.#b(Party Leader)#k
(1) #eEquipment Item#n\n  An item that can be equipped. Consists of a regular equipment item, which boosts the character's abillities, and cash item, which is geared more towards the appearance.
To equp an equipment item, open the equipment window and drag the item to the slot, or double-click on the item

(2) #eUse Item#n\n  These items consist of potions that help recover HP and/or MP, scrolls that upgrade the equipment items, and other 1-time items. Double-click on the item to use it, and the item will disappear following its use.
(3)#e Etc. Item#n\n  These items consist of monster leftovers, quest items, ores, jewels, and other items. Etc. items cannot be used by itself,
but they are pivotal in completing quests and other missions in the game.
(4)#e Cash Item#n\n  Items that can be purchased in Cash Shop. Primarily for appearance, as well as some visual effects.#rCash Items cost money, and Cash can be charged to purchase these items.#k
(1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be allocated to one of these categories: Strength(STR), Dexterity(DEX), Intelligence(INT), Luck(LUK), MaxHP, MaxMP. Earns 5 points for every level up.
#bStrength(STR)#k - Essential to carry around heavy armors and weapons. Most important to the warriors, for it directly determines the level of attack the warrior performs.
#bDexterity(DEX)#k - The higher this stat, the higher the accuracy and avoidability. The number one factor in determining the level of attack for bowmen.
#bIntelligence(INT)#k - The higher this stat, the better magic attacks get, as well as affecting the Max MP if AP is used in this stat. The number one factor in determining the mage's Magic Attack.

#bLuck(LUK)#k - The higher this stat is, the higher the avoidability, as well as a decrease in the EXP suffered from dying during the game. The number one factor in determining the level of attack for thieves.

(2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nThese points are earned after the 1st job advancement, and the points can be allocated towards skills available for the job. Each subsequent level-up will give 3 skill points.
All characters may make the job advancement after reaching a certin level. #r1st job advancement occurs at Level 8~10, 2nd at Level 30, and 3rd at Level 70#k
Once the job advancement takes place,  new skills can be mastered,  occupational weapons will be available, HP and MP will increase, and attack + defense will improve.
To make the 1st job advancement, first leave Maple Island and head over to Victoria Island.
To reach the Victoria Island, pay 150 mesos at Southperry and get on board the ship that heads to Lith Harbor.
Once at Lith Harbor, either take a cab or walk to each of these towns for the job advancement.
(1)#e Warrior#n\n#rLevel 10 and over, STR over 35#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bDances with Balrog#k at Perion to learn a thing or two about becoming a true warrior.
(2) #eBowman#n\n#rLevel 10 and over, DEX over 25#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bAthena Pierce#k at Henesys and learn what it's like to be the true bowman.

(3) #eThief#n\n#rLevel 10 and over, DEX over 25#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bDark Lord#k of Kerning City and pick up aspects of what it's like to live in the dark, becoming a true thief in the process.
(4)#e Magician#n\n#rLevel 8 and over, INT over 20#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bGrendel the Really Old#k of Ellinia and learn the ins and outs of becoming a true magician.

#bTip.#k It is strongly recommended that the job advancement takes place as soon as your character is eligible, for if the character makes the job advancement a level or two later, the SP's not earned in the mean time will not be made up.
\nLeafre is a town located right at the center of Minar Forest, the oldest forest in Ossyria.
\n1. At Ellinia Station, get on board the ride to Orbis
3. At Orbis Station, get on board the ride to Leafre
\n1.At  Ludibrium Station, get on board the ride to Orbis
3. At Orbis Station, get on board the ride to Leafre
#eTitle : I have finally started writing a diary.

The Owl of Minerva brought me some news. Apparently, there's a major movement amongst the humans in regards to writing a diary everyday.  As a goddess who needs to set a positive example to the humans, I have decided to follow suit. Truth be told, I'm already worried about writing an entry everyday.
The humans elected a huget tower as well as build a statue of my likeness.

For them to make a beautiful statue out of these rocks made me realize how brilliant the humans are with their ability to create something. I was so impressed by the statue that I have decided to keep it inside my tower.
\nIt's been a habit of mine lately to start each morning by staring at my statue while drinking tea. The more I look at it, the more I like how the statue resembles me a lot.
For humans to create a statue of my likeness with rocks... it still blows my mind.
\nToday, Papa Pixie came by for a visit wearing this round, weird-looking hat. He came wanting to buy some Water of Life so he can raise more Pixies.
I had to sternly tell him that the Water of Life is not for sale, much to his chagrin.
\n Today was a really rough day.
I heard a crack in the middle of the night, so I woke up only to find out my statue has been busted. Next to the crumbled statue was a footprint.
How dare that person to walk into my tower and have the audacity to break my statue!!
\nPapa Pixie, who came by a couple of days ago wanting the Water of Life, came back again, asking if I was interested in selling that water.
Amazingly, Papa Pixie offered to help fix the statue, which I was glad to hear. But then again, how did he know that the statue was busted in the first place?
\nToday, the humans paid a visit to the tower. I didn't want them to see the busted statue, so I had to hurriedly cover it up with some cloth.
Humans seemed to wonder why I put a cloth over the statue. I better get this fixed before they find out.
\nToday I felt like watering the garden, so I headed there, only to see Papa Pixie just sizing up the garden instead of working on the statue.
He didn't even finish fixing it, and for him to slack off like this? I was so mad I chased him out of the garden. Once the statue is taken care of, I will no doubt kick him out of the tower!

\nEak was following me around all day, telling me that Star Pixie is indeed acting suspicious and that I should kick him out of the tower immediately. Apparently, he kept on bringing unknown and unwanted pixies into the premise.
I am not a big fan of Papa Pixie, either, but I was so annoyed by Eak's constant yapper that I decided to ruin his cloud pieces. Hopefully that'll put an end to all that bla bla bla.
Looking at the busted statue of goddess, Papa Pixie said in order to make a new one, he'll need a new model and asked me for help.

Apparently, all I need to do is walk into the statue for a second, and he'll use his magic power to sketch it up and make a new one. It doesn't seem like a hard thing to do, so I agreed to do it. Finally!! The statue will be back up by tomorrow!

but the last visitor is the most hot-blooded of all...

lighted up a match... 
and threw 1 gold coin into the river. 
On the next evening... I lead the hot-blooded visitor to the present world. 
Scooping up a gold coin out from the river, 

his name is... #bThe Rememberer#k...

"this book is about the story of the Legendary Warrior 
 The Story of Sayram...

Great Warrior Sayram is the most outstanding swordsman in the history of MapleStory. He had mastered all the warrior classes including Hero, Paladin and Dark Knight, which no others have done before. \nBut his popularity and admiration from the people came not because of this. It is for Sayram's heroic and risky stories which allow the travelers in MapleStory to believe in the true meaning of courage and bravery.

And because of this, Sayram's stories were loved and passed on by many. 
Borned in a village among the deep forests in Victoria Island, he had went through countless tough ordeals to become a true hero... Hopefully, Maple travellers will be touched by Sayram's story to self-explore and make great achievements.

One day, Sayram arrived in the city of Orbis. In the Garden of Darkness, he saw an animal that he had never seen before! That animal had a long white horn on it's head like an eagle, 4 limbs of a horse, a lion's tail and a pair of large wings on its body. \nDeeply attracted by this animal, Sayram started to approach it slowly. But when the animal saw Sayram, it made a strange scream and starts to attack Sayram to protect itself.
\n\nThis animal possesses lightning speed, and wields a pair of giant wings that sent out strong gale of wind.

It was rumored that he first got to know about magic through a travelling magician. Having to arrive at the remotely small village, the magician doesn't seems to be that great afterall, and the magic he saw could be of a basic magic trick!  But somehow, it still touches him to see a magical ray created out of nowhere, and through this, he firmly set a target to possess this mysterious strength.

In order to study magic, he arrived at Ellinia, but there are no magicians willing to take him in. Although the present Ellinia forest should be consider as opened, compared to its past when the Ellinia forest is a more secluded environment. To everyone, he was just a naive countryside kid who knows nothing about magic.

But he has never given up. The passion for learning magic has made him work even harder. So, he settled down in Ellinia and goes around researching on his magical studies. The people teased his eagerness. But not long after, the people around could not help but to agree with him, because... by the time he completed his first round of research, people became more aware of his talent!

During that time, Grendel the Really Old who is the elder of Ellinia, believed that he can attain and become an outstanding magician, and also entrust him with many matters. He loves to research on magic that can revive the forest, and also provides lots of help to the magical forest. Besides Ellinia, the magical forest, in order to create forest in other region, he start to research on related issues.

To have flowers to blooming in a deserted area... should be a difficult matter! In order to obtain more magical knowledge, he started researching on ancient magic, working hard to understand the books of magic research, and also obtained suitable result. During that time... he was named the Genius of Ellinia.

The Genius of Ellinia Forest! With the ability of his talent, he completed his second, third and fourth advancement within a short time period. Nobody is able to beat his time record. Yet, he shows no arrogance, and continue to research on more advanced magic. He... has always hungered for higher levels of magic...

However... could this never-satisfying of hunger for magic... caused an adverse effect? In order to obtain more powers, he gets contact with the forbidden ancient book! For other people, even they could obtain that ancient book, they will not be able to understand the content. But... because of what of a talent he is, he was able to self-learnt the ancient magic... After obtaining the power... he did not know realised the actual fact that it is a Dark Force...

The force of the black magic starts to control him slowly, gradually causing his personality to change. He used to be a cheerful and bright guy, deeply concentrating in his research, but he gradually changes into an extremely moody guy. People thought that his changed of personality was a result of over-tiredness, and never start to think strangely...

In the end... the black magic had fully controlled him, and he now could not use the original magic he has. But he couldn't reverse back the time, he could only immerse deeply into the practice of black magic, and now... he had made a grave mistake which cannot be reversed.
He had spent a part of his life creating new magic skills... Isn't he aware that the force he had created could harm the world? In the end... he suffered for his own fate!

For him, who has lost his human appearance, he decided to seek the punishments from the elders. Gritto proposed of destroying him, but Grendel the Really Old could not bear to do it to his beloved disciple. Hence, it was decided to seal all his magic skills and he will be watched by the Elders. As a talented magician, his future has definitely gone to a waste.
In the end... I am unable to write down the name of this rare talented magician in the historical record book...This is deeply regretted...
Date: I have forgotten about the day... and month...
Author: The world's most talented scientist Hughes. There's no other scientist in this world who is able to overtake me! Hahaha~

Manufacture target: The black fog is the revolution of the Physic Synthesis! Mechanism Innovation! All science innovation! The manufacturing black fog, has bring the science revolution to a new height...! I think...

Materials: 1 Scavenger Fan 
100 black ink
50 Screws
1Long lasting dry cell batteries
50gears
10propellers
20steels
Suggesting to prepare sufficiently for convenience sake!
Manufacture methods: Refer to illustration artwork attached.

1. Connects lots of materials from the fierce propellers, make sure all of it are steel! Please don't make mistakes to substitute steel by lead or copper because the price for steel is too high. If you don't put enough effort, you may damage the black fog manufacturing device.

2. Manufacturing of long lasting batteries is difficult, therefore suggesting making the batteries in advance! If there's no way you could make the batteries, be it buy or make it, also must try to find a solution to obtain it!

3. Even it is not the long lasting batteries, using a normal batteries will do so too, but to change the batteries often is troublesome! Because... every time you change the batteries, you will need to re-organize the machine again!

4. Required pure ink that was not blend with sundry goods! Please do not think that you want to create some bubbly effect and adds in detergent or things that create the bubbly effect... if not careful, you will not creating black fog, but creating white clouds! #r Very Important! #k

Application methods: You must simultaneously press down the button behind the black fog manufacturing device, as well as the button beneath it and the button that is not easily seen. After that, pull the handle 3 times, After 10 seconds, press the button behind the device for 5 times, the button on top for 2 times, the button below for 16 times. For other contents, please refer to the illustration artwork of the operating procedure.
If you think that the mentioned methods are too troublesome, hit the manufacturing device twice!
After use: It may create black fog, the person who used it might also obtain the skill to control the black fog. I'll have no other way, if the person is unable to obtain it~
Quote from the author: The person who has a grateful heart, respect the person with talent, please use it well~
Ever heard of the Lava Essence?

It is the world hottest liquid! 
it is uncontrollable even with any powerful strength! 
it can melt even the world strongest force! 
The Sun!

The strength of the flame that is blazing hot forever... 
nobody actually knew how it was produced... 
when it was produced... 
its originality... 

in order to obtain that formidable strength, many magicians had went to challenged it, but all of them just can't obtain it!

Its hotness is unbearable to mankind... 
in a place deep down beneath the land... 
with the strength of a human, they will not be able to control it. 
not even to obtain it~

In a place deep down beneath the land, from the melting of lava that created it... the only method to obtain it... will be by using all the snow from an ice field to cool it down. \n but... because of it being in a place deep down beneath the land, it will eventually has its weakness... \n at the center of the place deep down beneath the land, is the place where the lava essence flows out...

Although this is only a small scrap fragment, but the strength hidden in it... is enough to melt a mountain... 

the magician to possess the skill to control the flame~ 
if you want to control all the flames in this world, you will have to consume the lava essence!

Only if the hot lava is trapped in your body... 
with the hot lava in your body... 
 will be the only method to control the flame! 

if you do not has its courage, 
you will not have the quality to control it!

Do you know about the ancient iceberg? 
It was the world most coldest ice... 
you will not be able to breaks it with any power... 
the only way will be... 
the moon...

That eternal cold strength... 
nobody know how it was produced... 
and when it was produced... 
its originality... 

 in order to obtain that formidable strength, many magicians had went to challenged it, but all of them just can't obtain it!

It can be located at the place where the coldness is unbearable... 
and in the extremely cold and dangerous ice canyon, 
with the strength of a human... they will not be able to reach there. 

Standing tall at the ice canyon... to be able to destroy it, you will need to have the hammer that is made specially by giant...

But... There's weaknesses in it due to it been under the sun shine for so long! 
Even for an ancient iceberg... that resembled a hard statue will too have its fissure, 

the person who possess the cold ice magic~ 
if you want to possess all the magic that controlled cold ice... 
you will have to consume the ice stone powder from the ancient ice!

Only if the cold air is trapped in your body... 
with the cold air in your body... 
will be the only method to create cold ice! 
 if you do not has its courage, 
you will not have the quality to control it!

The content in this book is written down for a genius archer to prepare his journey for a much dangerous journey~

You are the one who opened this book, thus you are the one that will be the owner of this skill, and hope you are an archer. But if you do not possess an eye with your innermost feelings, this book can also become the creation of gathering of some waste papers.

The eye of mind definitely is not the ending point of an archer's journey... At a higher level area, there will be more challenging experience... but right now you will not be able to notice this due to the arrogance in your eyes~

While I'm writing this book, I once chance upon this skill book, but right now with the ignorance I have, I'll develop a brand new method to record this book. Sighs... but I'm still yet to develop this brand new method...
while reading this book... do visit the #btraining field#k! To achieve a greater level of strength, do make a visit to this place, all kinds of mysteries can be found there!
Once you had completed the training there, you will be able to prove that you are ready to experience a brand new journey.
I believe he will use all kind of methods, to teach you all the execution of skills, I will not need to worry...

A different technique compare to the arrow skills... Through this training, you will see the power of the arrow skill! I believe in this area,  no one will be able to outwit you with this arrow skill.
Wishing you best of luck... the brave warrior who is walking on the same journey with me...

Mr. Do's Book on Herbal Medicine





-Written By-
Mr. Do

Unbeknownst to many Maple World travelers is a peculiar creature. When I was young, I came across one of these. It was a snail but much larger and olderIt has been said that it has the longest life span amongst all Maple World snails.

Since I was young, I was always drawn to the snails. This one time when I was observing the little creature at a close distance, I noticed something. The snail was leaving a trail of snail shells of which some were green, blue, and red. But there was this one shell that stood out amongst the rest.

That shell had an array of rainbow colors. Its colors are so captivating that you know it's very valuable at first glance. Its value is cannot be compared with any treasure or jewel. I took that snail shell and guarded it with my life.
When I used the shell I was able to achieve anything I wished to. The rainbow snail shell made all my hopes and desires come true! The thing I wished for was!
